Class RiabDialog

Class RiabDialog¶

This page contains the documentation for the Risk-In-A-Box RiabDialog class.

class riab.RiabDialog(iface)¶

Dialog implementation class for the Risk In A Box plugin.

getLayers()¶

Helper function to obtain a list of layers currently loaded in QGIS.

On invocation, this method will populate the lstLayers on the dialog with a list of available layers.

Args:
None.
Returns:
None
Raises:
no
